name: Impossible Stunts
description:
Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience in this racing game of Impossible Stunts!

Take on the challenge of traversing treacherous routes and defying gravity with daring stunts behind the wheel of luxurious cars. Push your driving skills to the limit as you navigate gravity-defying tracks, leap across massive gaps, and perform mind-blowing stunts. With a mission to conquer the impossible, get ready to embark on an extraordinary journey in this action-packed, high-flying game.

Your mission, even if it seems simple at first, namely to overcome all the obstacles you will encounter in trying to reach the end of each level, will become more and more complicated as you pass through the levels.

Game Features :
- Diverse Selection of Luxury Cars
- 20 levels
- Freestyle Stunt Mode
